home.name: Tommaso Boscardin
home.title: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering
home.introduction: Hi, I’m Tommaso. I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Ingegneria Informatica from the University of Padova and am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Computer Engineering. I’m passionate about exploring advanced technologies and developing innovative software solutions. On this site, you’ll find my academic projects, research, and personal tech experiments.
